website_summaries.verdict: There is almost no reason to buy the Carlisle over the ITP Mud Lite and Kenda Bearclaw, which are better all-around tires and go for a much lower price.
pros: It provides solid traction without damaging the turf or grass underneath the vehicle - an important consideration if you plan on using it in your own yard
cons: More expensive than the Bearclaw or ITP

customer_reviews.title: Great zero turn tires
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase because I'm using them on a zero-turn mower which requires a higher low capacity. After seeing other people use these and researching the load capacity on the manufacturer's website I decided to go for it. These tires did the trick and function exceptionally well without tearing up much grass and with no compromise on mower right or function on my Dixie Chopper with 60 inch cut. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: No More Slides
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the stock tires on my Ferris with these and could not be happier! I have some steep banks and some wet places, and these handle it all very well. I can mow within inches of the water on my pond dam now, and the steep inclines of the backside of the dam, which have always been challenging are easily handled. As long as you use some common sense they will not tear up your turf. In fact I am actually seeing less damage, because they are spinning and sliding. Paid $20 to have the pair mounted at the tire shop.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Carlisle HD Field Trax ATV Tire - 24X12-12
customer_reviews.text: These tires replaced OEM turf tires on Dixie Chopper Silver Eagle, 60 inch cut. It won't be going as fast as turf tires, but it will grab the ground better on wet grass or sloped ground. I wished that I have bought these tires before sliding down hill twice with turf tires. Installation is easy if you take your time, use lots of soap. If you start with the stem up and it did not work, then take it out and start with the stem on the rim down.
customer_reviews.author: pa17315

customer_reviews.title: Good traction and looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my John Deere Z960M. The 24x12-12 was an exact size replacement. The traction is so much better on the hills than the stock Turf Master tires.
customer_reviews.author: The Photography Hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: These have been great. Put two on a hustler super z
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. Put two on a hustler super z. Gives great ride, flexes nice with the zero turn weight and gives traction when needs. Does not tear up the grass. Have had them on one season and looks like many years to come before needing to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Not for Gator in Texas hill country
customer_reviews.text: 2 ply construction, like an inner tube with tread. Mesquite will flatten them even with quart of flat sealant. Changed to 6 ply tires for the gators rear tires instead wish they had Kevlar tires like kubota rtv has they’re indestructible
customer_reviews.author: diesldog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement for Gator 6x4 Rear Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these tires to replace the factory tires on my late 1990's John Deere Gator 6x4. While they certainly are VERY expensive (almost $400 to replace the 4 rear tires), they really are a nice tire. Plenty of tread and grip, and they seem to be a heavier ply than the factory tires. They are a bit hard on the grass when making tight turns, but they certainly provide great traction and a comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: 22x12.00-8 fit in place of 20x10.00-8 Buy them and don’t look back!
customer_reviews.text: I had 20x10.00-8 tires on my Cub Cadet zero turn. I went with 22x12.00-8. They fit wonderful and I could not be happier. They absolutely do not tare my lawn up, and have traction!!! Something I’ve always desired since I got it. The turf savers were HORRIBLE!! When they started leaking I opted for new rubber and Im really happy with my decision. They were pretty challenging to install on the rims. I’d say bring them to a tire shop if you don’t know how challenging small tires can be to mount!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Chatman

customer_reviews.title: Good meaty tread
customer_reviews.text: These look and work well on my Gator. The reason for 4 stars is that previous Carlisle tires I have purchased rotted out in the sidewalls in about a year. If these do the same, they will be the last Carlisle tires I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle81401

customer_reviews.title: Whole new mower, wish I bought these sooner.
customer_reviews.text: My Exmark Lazer feels like it has brand new wheel motors now. This used to slide all over, wet or dry didn’t matter. Now it actually turns when I pull the lever. Yes, you can tear up the lawn. Not a real challenge to drive it without tearing grass.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Holsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality...good price...
customer_reviews.text: Needed tires for front of my John Deere X729. Arrived in a few days, took to a tire shop to have mounted. Very pleased so for. Good on grass, wet or dry. Excellent in snow. (Original equipment tires were the same) Remember to replace valve stems.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K

customer_reviews.title: Great traction!
customer_reviews.text: Very hilly here in SW OH, and wet also this year. Got stuck in the mud several times this spring, my 20yr old turf tires weren't getting the job done. These have somewhat aggressive tread, so making turns takes care and practice, but they work great on my cub 60" zero turn.
customer_reviews.author: skibusch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome traction
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my 61” Scag mower. Our yard is fairly hilly so the traction was a problem. Mowing now in confidence in the steep hills. Definitely worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Hostamon

customer_reviews.title: Good long lasting tire, but somewhat weak side wall resistance to puncture.
customer_reviews.text: Good long lasting tire. However the side wall could be more puncture resistant. I live in the woods so random sticks are sometimes a problem for the tire side wall. Had to replace 2 tires at different times.
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Just like my originals and they work well. I went to several local dealers in Omaha and none could match the price. Close, but not quite and even if they would have matched I would have had sales tax. So I'm happy with these tires. If you need it quickly I would suggest taking this price to them and see how close that they will come. They all did quite a bit better with pricing I showed them what they were up against.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: ordered 2, only 1 delivered
customer_reviews.text: Apparently UPS lost one tire. Amazon will replace the 2nd tire, but will be over a week later to get it. So the repairs I needed to do to the mower will be delayed a week. Not Amazon's fault, but delays cost money! The tire I did get looks good! A little on the pricey side, but we shall see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Central R.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, only gripe is Fedex faked a delivery attempt on Saturday but did get on Monday so wish seller would use UPS , the Fedex bs is getting old
customer_reviews.author: Harley Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This was a exact match to what I had. Tread pattern everything. These are some heavy duty tires and as long as I don't hurt the side ex wall again this should last a very long time for my son. Thanks Carlisle for a well made tire. Oh, Discount Tire only charged 10$ to mount the tire for me. Thank you Discount Tire.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Nesbit

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These tires are just like the originals on my John Deere X595. They are a perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.author: dennis parman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper! Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My husband's now a happy camper since getting these 2 tires for his gator. Can't be without his machine to help with working around the farm. Shopped online, various merchants, brick & mortar stores, and found these tires at a great price. Saved a ton of time and energy by getting these from this merchant and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dirt Painter

customer_reviews.title: Best field/hill tire IMO
customer_reviews.text: Night and day! I exchanged my brand new turf tires for these monster grabbers and have truly made the correct choice. I finish cut approx. 10 field acres in east Tennessee. The hills I do horizontally, most hills at 45° slope. These babies hold my 1100 lb zturn with minimal cut up. Just go slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Please tell me your email address and I will send you broken tire photo for warranty replacement because tire quality is too bad. Also please tell me how to process warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought ATV tire 25x13-9 on 7/18/2017 and now it is broken on the side of tire . Only use about 1 month . Please tell me your email address and I will send you broken tire photo for warranty replacement because tire quality is too bad. Also please tell me how to process warranty replacement. Thank you! Sheng Yang shengchuanyang@hotmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Sheng Y.

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough so far after several months.
customer_reviews.text: These tires greatly improved the steerability of my John Deere gator 6X4. I'm also pretty hard on them but I haven't had any punctures yet.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tire for my 94 Gator
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 1994 John Deere Gator, absolutely no issues
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and cheaper than my local tire store. Fast delivery also.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Used for a 1985 Honda Big Red 250ES
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. My daughter is happy we can ride again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Butler

customer_reviews.title: Lots of rubber
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the new tires our Gator rides like did when new!!! Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Dimples Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set bead
customer_reviews.text: Tires seem fine. Setting the bead is very difficult. I struggled for a couple hours, couldn't get them on. Took them to a Walmart tire center for mounting, they couldn't set the bead either. Had to buy inner tubes to get the bead set. I don't understand why these tires are so hard to mount, but others have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin j. sykora

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This tire was perfect! Finally got our Gator up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Smk043087

customer_reviews.title: Matched the original
customer_reviews.text: The tread matched the OEM tires on my 6x4 Gator. The sidewalls were pliable enough that I was able to install it with a couple of tire spoons, instead of having to take it to a tire shop. Its working fine.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the 23x10.5x12 turf tread tires on my JD GT235 Garden Tractor. I installed a sleeve hitch plow and wanted the extra traction. I was not disappointed. The extra traction pulls the plow without wheel weights or chains and I could not be more pleased. I was at first concerned that the aggressive tread design would not be good for my lawn, but it is not a problem at all. I should have bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Spats

customer_reviews.title: Fits JD X720
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade from the stock turf tires on the rear of my John Deere X720. These tires were a good choice. The old tires had traction issues and they rode terrible. These tires have great traction without tearing up the lawn, and they ride very smooth. Very happy with these tires!
customer_reviews.author: J. MICHEL

customer_reviews.title: very flimsy sidewall
customer_reviews.text: The sidewall on this tire is very thin. It blew out making the tire worthless when the professional at the tire store was trying to seal the bead. Would not ever buy again, guess it’s a lesson about buying the cheapest product
customer_reviews.author: Merritt Cole

customer_reviews.title: Even though the tire size was the same as the ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though the tire size was the same as the previous tires there is a noticeable difference in the diameter of the new tires which in turn causes my mower to sit lower. When cutting higher grass causes a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tires for our Gator! They are great tires! Lots of grip! Smooth ride!
customer_reviews.author: Leen1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my zero turn mower and they are awesome. Great traction and don’t really tear anything up.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed new tires for the Gator and these worked extremely well. Great competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mama's

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my hustler x-one 60"
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my hustler x-one 60". Great traction. Doesn't tear up the grass if you are mindful of what you're doing. Like having 4 wheel drive for your mower.
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match to what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my 6x4 gator and shipping was fast, 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great performance! We have a farm and these have ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these tires for heavy duty use on our 4x6 gator since summer. Great performance! We have a farm and these have proven to be worth every cent. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mphoto

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade to 60 inch zero turn mower
customer_reviews.text: Needed new tires for my Gravely zero turn mower and I bought these for more traction and control on hills, ditches and wet grass. They are much better than the turf tires it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Seven

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my zero turn mower. Have to take a bit more care while turning, but I no longer slide on hills or tear up get stuck on and tear up soft/wet soil.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Best grip ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for these for my Massey Ferguson lawn tractor. Best tires ever !! Love the traction they give !!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L

customer_reviews.title: John Deere gator wheels
customer_reviews.text: this tire is not sealing on the John Deere Gator rim! Is this tire not compatible to JD rim?
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Tire
customer_reviews.text: Purchased tires for John Deer Gator. Off loaded gator from dealer with new tire installed, parked in barn. Returned from vacation to find sidewall blown out. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Norseman

customer_reviews.title: Badass Tires
customer_reviews.text: These tires provide monster traction to my Gator. And they are run faults!!!! Love these tires!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacment tires
customer_reviews.text: Fit our gator perfectly same tread pattern that worked since 1996, shipped quickly at a fair price should last for years. Great for dirt & grass not so good for slick mud & snow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were what replacement tire for the tires are on my gator they worked out superbly

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for John Deere 4x2 Gator
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, perfect replacement for my John Deere 4x2 Gator. Now I have to order another.. original tires lasted over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: fit 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.text: Tires have worked on the 4 wheeler with no problems

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tire!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tire for our John Deere Gator! Fit as described
customer_reviews.author: adam rohrbach

customer_reviews.title: John Deere 4x6 Gator
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a tire on our John Deere 4 x 6 Gator, fit perfectly! Best price that we could find!

customer_reviews.title: Unusual Tire Size
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find tire ! Reasonably priced and delivered before promised. Very Happy

customer_reviews.text: This is the tire that matched the new tire from the previous summer's blowout. Found on Amazon!

customer_reviews.text: Good tires. I have them on my 4wd lawn tractor. They have held up great. However they are a little pricey.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacment
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect & exactly the same as when it was new.

customer_reviews.title: Great turf tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, wish they came in more size options. Only down side is they're expensive for being a turf tire

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: Received expected product in a reasonable time at expected cost.

customer_reviews.title: Exact John Deere X748 replacement
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and exact replacement for my 2009 X784 John Deere. You can NOT beat these prices at any JD dealer. Recommended

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems good. Works good. Much cheaper than shopping around our town.

customer_reviews.title: work really well fast shipping was a plus would buy
customer_reviews.text: work really well fast shipping was a plus would buy again

customer_reviews.text: Good quality tire that I put on my 6 wheel Gator. Arrived a little late because it was accidentally sent to another state.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected without having to shop in town...easy and reasonable priced.

customer_reviews.title: Carlisle HD field trax
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for a John Deere gator. More cost effective and better value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very robust tire!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the front tire on my old AMT 626. Couldn't be happier! Shipping was amazingly fast and the tire is a beast. I expect that it will last for a very, very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price point!
customer_reviews.text: Best price out there for this tire with free Uber lighting shipping speed. I've used tire before and I have to say it's the easiest tire to mount on a rim.
customer_reviews.author: William A

customer_reviews.title: S_Hughes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the aged factory rear tires on a John Deere 425. No more spinning tires on wet grass while mowing. While a bit larger than the factory tires, they fit and had plenty of clearance with the 60" mower deck. I will now have fewer worries when using this tractor for firewood cutting duty in the woods, and when the deep snow hits mid winter and the snow blower is installed.
customer_reviews.author: S_Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Carlisle atv tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, if your looking for JD gator ties these are the ones.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality ,  this is the best I have ever used  AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ,, this is the best I have ever used AAAAA+++++

customer_reviews.title: Hell, they're just tires
customer_reviews.text: Have someone mount them, 2 drunks and tire spoons took too long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Davis

customer_reviews.title: great product, price and delivery
customer_reviews.text: I needed these tires for a john deere Gator, on which they were original equipment. They're not easy to find retail, and if you find them they're expensive. This on-line outfit got them to me in two days from my order (!) and at 2/3s of the best price I could find elsewhere. This is one of the best on-line purchases I've made.
customer_reviews.author: BEM

customer_reviews.title: fantastic tire!
customer_reviews.text: had turf tires on my JD GX335...sliding, slipping, spinning on damp or wet grass....even managed to get stuck a couple of times! No longer! Have a 42 inch mowing deck, plenty of clearance! Take my time (no high speed turns) and doesn't damage the grass at all. Great traction. Will be really fun this winter with my snow blower. Can't recommend this tire enough :)
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: 4 atv tires
customer_reviews.text: received 3 out of 4 tires and nobody seems to want to know anything!

customer_reviews.text: Used these same tires on a 6x4 Gator for 12 years. They are awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires.  I replaced 4 old tires on my 4X6 JD Gator and they are working very well.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tires. I replaced 4 old tires on my 4X6 JD Gator and they are working very well.

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for not a lot of money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace two John Deere Gator tires, they arrived within three days, which was great because the old tires would no longer hold air. The replacements from the dealer were about $150 apiece (plus mounting) so of course I knew I could beat that at Amazon. The new tires appear to be much "beefier" than the originals and higher quality. The old tires lasted about 900 hours, so I'm willing to bet I can get a lot more out of these!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
